sections.content:
Question:
Can a single interrupt go to multiple CPU cores?
Answer:
Yes, it can. If the same peripheral is selected, or if an interrupt is coming from a peripheral that is connected to all cores by default, multiple cores can be notified of a single interrupt simultaneously.
Suitable Products
RZ/T2H, RZ/N2H
